job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Information Technology Analyst (Generative AI Engineer) - Hybrid
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As the Senior Information Technology Analyst (Generative AI Engineer), you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI by enabling data teams to build cutting-edge Generative AI tools on the Azure OpenAI infrastructure (and others). In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing Generative AI models and solutions to solve complex business problems. You will work closely with data scientists, data engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure that the Generative AI tools are integrated seamlessly into the organization's data ecosystem. Additionally, you will be responsible for staying up to date with the latest advancements in Generative AI and incorporating them into the organization's AI strategy.

   Responsibilities
     * Acts as a primary technical focal point for Generative AI platform
     * Leads platform development and systems design used at Dow
     * Develops and maintains foundational components that power Generative AI tools
     * Collaborates on system design with appropriate internal resources for strategic and security alignment
     * Leads the design and implementation of generative AI operations capabilities
     * Consults, trains, and supports Dow technical resources using our platform infrastructure to build their own solutions
     * Stays abreast of latest news related to Generative AI trends both technically and functionally to inform architectural design making
     * Acts as an analytics evangelist and champions Dow's data and analytics culture change
     * Contributes to the maturity of Hub & Spoke
     * Ability to travel within the US as needed
job_details.full_text:
Senior Information Technology Analyst (Generative AI Engineer) - Hybrid

As the Senior Information Technology Analyst (Generative AI Engineer), you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI by enabling data teams to build cutting-edge Generative AI tools on the Azure OpenAI infrastructure (and others). In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing Generative AI models and solutions to solve complex business problems. You will work closely with data scientists, data engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure that the Generative AI tools are integrated seamlessly into the organization's data ecosystem. Additionally, you will be responsible for staying up to date with the latest advancements in Generative AI and incorporating them into the organization's AI strategy.

   Responsibilities
     * Acts as a primary technical focal point for Generative AI platform
     * Leads platform development and systems design used at Dow
     * Develops and maintains foundational components that power Generative AI tools
     * Collaborates on system design with appropriate internal resources for strategic and security alignment
     * Leads the design and implementation of generative AI operations capabilities
     * Consults, trains, and supports Dow technical resources using our platform infrastructure to build their own solutions
     * Stays abreast of latest news related to Generative AI trends both technically and functionally to inform architectural design making
     * Acts as an analytics evangelist and champions Dow's data and analytics culture change
     * Contributes to the maturity of Hub & Spoke
     * Ability to travel within the US as needed

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and implementing Generative AI models and solutions, specifically mentioning 'Generative AI tools', 'Generative AI platform', and 'generative AI operations capabilities'. The responsibilities include leading platform development, building foundational components for Generative AI tools, and staying updated on Generative AI trends. The mention of 'Azure OpenAI infrastructure' further supports this classification. While it involves collaboration with data teams, the core focus is on building and deploying GenAI applications and infrastructure, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'designing, developing, and implementing Generative AI models and solutions' directly relates to the creation and adaptation of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: designing, developing, and implementing Generative AI models and solutions

job_tasks.justification: The responsibilities 'Leads platform development and systems design' and 'Develops and maintains foundational components that power Generative AI tools' indicate building and maintaining software systems that support GenAI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Leads platform development and systems design

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develops and maintains foundational components that power Generative AI tools' points to the creation of core software elements for GenAI applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Develops and maintains foundational components that power Generative AI tools

job_tasks.justification: The responsibility 'Collaborates on system design with appropriate internal resources for strategic and security alignment' involves the software engineering aspect of ensuring systems are well-designed and secure.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborates on system design with appropriate internal resources for strategic and security alignment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leads the design and implementation of generative AI operations capabilities' directly aligns with the MLOps domain, focusing on operationalizing AI systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Leads the design and implementation of generative AI operations capabilities

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solve complex business problems' indicates an understanding of how technical solutions address business needs.

The phrase 'Stays abreast of latest news related to Generative AI trends both technically and functionally to inform architectural design making' shows an understanding of how broader trends impact technical decisions.
job_tasks.phrase: Stays abreast of latest news related to Generative AI trends both technically and functionally to inform architectural design making

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Acts as an analytics evangelist and champions Dow's data and analytics culture change' implies understanding and promoting the business value of data and analytics.
job_tasks.phrase: Acts as an analytics evangelist and champions Dow's data and analytics culture change
